value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

value.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

value.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

value.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Discover how to create a Docker image and store it in the Azure Container Registry, then use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the image.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Use Visual Studio together with a test framework to create, deploy, and test an Azure Function.

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure compute options
value.excerpt: Explore essential Azure concepts to find out how virtual machines, containers, and apps combined with serverless computing services can fortify your business.

value.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Update Management to update virtual machines, verify agent connectivity, and use Azure Log Analytics in your cloud environment.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of webhooks when you trigger an Azure function with a GitHub webhook and parse the payload for insights.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Administer infrastructure resources in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path teaches how to create and customize Windows and Linux virtual machines, connect them to virtual networks, and keep them updated.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

topItems.excerpt: Find out to use Azure Queue storage to handle high demand and improve resilience in your distributed applications.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

value.title: Architect secure infrastructure in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
topItems.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

topItems.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

value.title: AZ-104: Configure and manage virtual networks for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure and manage Azure network capabilities like connectivity services, application protection, application delivery, and network monitoring services. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

topItems.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to host your domain on Azure DNS.

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

value.title: AZ-104: Deploy and manage Azure compute resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy and configure virtual machines, containers, and Web Apps in Azure. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: AZ-104: Implement and manage storage in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage storage accounts, data in Azure Storage, and Azure File and Blob storage. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

topItems.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

topItems.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
topItems.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.
